resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105934</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105934</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Virtual Hip Replacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtueller Hüfte-Wiedereinbau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplacement Virtuel de Hanche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recolocação Virtual Do Hip</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rimontaggio Virtuale Dell'Anca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονική αντικατάσταση ισχίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reemplazo Virtual De la Cadera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Take on the role of the Surgeon throughout a hip replacement surgery! Edheads helps students learn through educational games and activities designed to meet state and national standards. Teacher guides, lesson plans and classroom handouts available.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nehmen Sie auf der Rolle des Chirurgen während 
einer Hüftewiedereinbauchirurgie! Edheads Hilfen Kursteilnehmer
erlernen durch pädagogische Spiele und die Aktivitäten, die 
konzipiert sind, um Zustand und nationalen Standards zu entsprechen. 
Lehreranleitungen, Lektionpläne und 
Klassenzimmermitteilungsblätter vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prenez le rôle du chirurgien dans toute une 
chirurgie de remplacement de hanche ! Les étudiants d'aides 
d'Edheads apprennent par les jeux éducatifs et les activités conçus
pour répondre à l'état et aux normes nationales. Guides de 
professeur, plans de leçon et aumônes de salle de classe 
disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça exame no papel do cirurgião durante todo 
uma cirurgia da recolocação do hip! Os estudantes das ajudas 
de Edheads aprendem com os jogos educacionais e as atividades 
projetados encontrar-se com o estado e padrões nacionais. Guias
do professor, plantas da lição e handouts da sala de aula 
disponíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intraprenda il ruolo del chirurgo durante un 
ambulatorio del rimontaggio dell'anca! Gli allievi di aiuti di 
Edheads imparano attraverso i giochi educativi e le attività 
destinate per venire a contatto di dichiarano e standard 
nazionali. Guide dell'insegnante, programmi di lezione e 
dispense dell'aula disponibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάρτε το ρόλο του χειρούργου σε όλη μια χειρουργική 
επέμβαση αντικατάστασης ισχίων! Το Edheads βοηθά τους 
σπουδαστές να μάθουν μέσω των εκπαιδευτικών παιχνιδιών και των 
δραστηριοτήτων με σκοπό να ανταποκριθούν στο κράτος και τα εθνικά
πρότυπα. Οδηγοί δασκάλων, σχέδια μαθήματος και φυλλάδια 
τάξεων διαθέσιμοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Adquiera el papel del cirujano a través de una 
cirugía del reemplazo de la cadera! Los estudiantes de las 
ayudas de Edheads aprenden con juegos educativos y actividades 
diseñados para resolver el estado y estándares nacionales. 
Guías del profesor, planes de la lección y folletos de la sala
de clase disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105934</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/virtual-hip-replacement</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
